value:
$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|You will never improve if you cannot
learn to reach beyond your physical
strength. You will not win that way!$k$pMind over muscle! Use your foe's
momentum against them!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|I understand!$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I believe in you, Tana! I'm right
behind you! You can do this!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_FireFes22,Face|Now that I've warmed up, there is
no way I will lose a second time!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_FireFes22,Face|Mordecai's stomach growls
louder by the minute... Let us
end this!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_FireFes22,Face|Enough yammering! The time for
the final match is here!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Wait—I won? ...I won!$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Good work, Tana!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Agreed. Your manipulation of your
opponent's weight was masterful.$k$pYou made effective use of your
superior agility, and you put on
a good show as well.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you, Rinkah! I couldn't
have done it without all of your
expert instruction.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|I simply played my part... Now, hold
still—you've got some dirt on your
face. Not a good look for the victor.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Er, hey! Could you wipe a little
more gently, please?$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Hee hee! You two behave almost
as if you're long-lost sisters!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Hmph. Don't be ridiculous. More
like she's a stray, and I lack the
good sense to leave her be.$k$pThough...I am proud like a sister
might be.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|What about my feelings?! I worked
hard, and all to escape my brother's
shadow, and...now what?$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|I think inspiring others to look
after you is an admirable quality
in itself, Tana!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Whatever happens, today was more
entertaining than I expected it would
be, thanks to you two.$k$pBut more than that, you poured your
heart into the festival celebrations,
and for that, I am thankful.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|I should be the one to thank you,
in all honesty!$k$pI know the festival will be coming
to an end soon, but I hope you'll
teach me more again one day.$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Of course.$k$pYou may not be a member of the
Flame Tribe, but our time together
here has taught me much.$k$pI must remember to extend thanks
to $Nu as well...$k$p
